Z images should be easy to read even in dark mode. In particular the contrast for the relevant elements should not be too low.

A contrast color is available for this, which is light or dark depending on the mode. This color is also used for regular text. If no color is explicitly assigned to an element, the contrasting color is automatically selected. This color can also be selected by using
To see the change, please switch the color mode.
